name: Amber Sabre

attributes.Augments: Annihilation -> +14% critical extra damage, Annihilation -> -8s cooldown

notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Amber Slayer

attributes.Augments: Annihilation -> +14% critical extra damage, Annihilation -> -8s cooldown

notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Assassin Dagger
notes:
Notes
Used to be a very rare item, however after Summer Update 2008 it is much easier to obtain, due to it being a reward from a quest. Great weapon for knights using sword around level 40.
Obtainable in the The Thieves Guild Quest.

name: Berserker
notes:
Notes
Strong two-handed weapon for mid-levels. It has the same attack value of Magic Sword and Blade of Corruption, two level 80+ swords, while being usable by a level 65. It is one of the most powerful two-handed sword that has 3 imbuement slots until level 200, when the Slayer of Destruction becomes available.

name: Blacksteel Sword
notes:
Notes
This item is a good two-handed sword for low-mid level knights who cannot afford or use the slightly better and much heavier Giant Sword. It is also relatively easy to get.
Reward from the Arena, Greenhorn level.

name: Blade of Corruption
notes:
Notes
A good, often cheaper alternative to the Magic Sword.  It has the same attack power, but one less shielding bonus.

name: Blade of Destruction
notes:
Notes
Yana will trade you one for 50 Gold Tokens.

name: Bloody Edge
notes:
Notes
It is a rare item used mostly for decoration. It is used less than before since the implementation of the Zaoan Sword, which is easier to get ahold of and has slightly better attributes.

name: Bone Sword
notes:
Notes
Part of the Bone Set.

name: Bright Sword
notes:
Notes
Until the Summer Update 2007, the bright sword was one of the best swords available on most worlds. Nowadays this sword is mostly used by lower levels. Although due to its abundance it is still one of the most used swords until level 60 when players can use a Mystic Blade.

Can be obtained by completing the Bright Sword Quest.

name: Broadsword
notes:
Notes
Not as useful as the Two Handed Sword which is more common and more powerful for about the same price. It is the best two-handed sword available for characters below level 20.Reward in the Alawar's Vault Quest.

name: Broken Macuahuitl

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkCreature ProductsSword Weapons

notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Carlin Sword
notes:
Notes
If you have one of these in Rookgaard and already reached level 8 you may want to keep it, if you are going to Carlin. A common strategy in Rookgaard was to buy as many carlin swords as the Rookgaardian can carry and sell all their equipment to other Rookgaardians and make a hefty profit on the carlin swords in Mainland, although this may not be recommendable now that one goes to the Island of Destiny at level 8 (Raffael doesn't buy Carlin Swords).
Obtainable in Rookgaard through the Minotaur Hell Quest.

name: Cobra Sword
notes:
Notes
Currently the best obtainable one-handed sword that deals physical damage.

name: Combat Knife
notes:
Notes
Maybe your first sword in the game on Rookgaard. 
You can obtain it from the Combat Knife Quest.

name: Cowtana
notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Crimson Sword (Uzgod)
notes:
Notes
Part of The Travelling Trader Quest.

name: Crimson Sword
notes:
Notes
Cheap and good weapon for characters of level 20, it can only be bought in Premium account areas.

name: Crude Umbral Blade
notes:
Notes
See also Umbral Creation.

name: Crude Umbral Slayer
notes:
Notes
See also Umbral Creation.

name: Crystal Sword
notes:
Notes
Good weapon for low level knights and common loot from creatures of cold areas around Svargrond.

name: Crystalline Sword
notes:
Notes
It is the best weapon for its level range, even superior to  the Runed Sword and Nightmare Blade.
Its value may vary a lot among worlds, especially world types as they are obtained via Warzones which are considerably tougher on Open PvP and Hardcore PvP worlds.
There are no NPCs who buy this sword, so a knight can stand to lose a lot of money by investing in it. For that reason it may be better to settle with Mystic Blade until The Justice Seeker (almost equivalent) becomes available.
However on some older servers the price can often go as low as 4000-8000 gold if not less, making it a very cheap sword that is just as good as the The Justice Seeker and can be gotten 13 levels earlier at a significantly lower price. When prices are this low it makes it one of the best swords for knights in the level 62-100 range to have and a sound investment.
Rarely obtained from Mucus Plugs.

name: Dagger
notes:
Notes
One of the weakest swords in the game, primarily used for training, either with another player or by slow-killing weak monsters with it.

name: Demonrage Sword
notes:
Notes
It is a little bit more powerful and lighter than the popular two-handed Giant Sword. It's rather difficult to obtain as it is very rarely looted from Demons.

name: Djinn Blade
notes:
Notes
Used to be one of the priceless Pharaoh Rares, but now it's also dropped by The Sandking and much easier to obtain.

name: Dragon Slayer
notes:
Notes
Relatively cheap and only slightly weaker alternative for the Giant Sword.

name: Draining Inferniarch Blade
notes:
Notes
Part of the Inferniarch Set. Can be obtained using an Inferniarch Blade in the Doomforge.
None of the Draining Inferniarch weapons can be imbued with Basic, Intricate, or Powerful Vampirism.

name: Draining Inferniarch Slayer
notes:
Notes
Part of the Inferniarch Set. Can be obtained using an Inferniarch Slayer in the Doomforge.
None of the Draining Inferniarch weapons can be imbued with Basic, Intricate, or Powerful Vampirism.

name: Eldritch Claymore
notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Emerald Sword
notes:
Notes
It is currently one of the best one-handed swords in the game for Knights under level 200.
Obtainable in the The Inquisition Quest.

name: Epee
notes:
Notes
This weapon can be seen in the pirate "armory" on Nargor. The Epee is a good choice of weapon for mid level Paladins wishing to carry a backup weapon, as it is both light and has respectable damage.

name: Falcon Longsword
notes:
Notes
Part of the Falcon Set and one of the best Sword Weapons in the game. It is also currently the strongest purely Physical weapon in the game, along with the Eldritch Greataxe for axe users.

name: Fire Sword
notes:
Notes
Mainly used from level 30 to 35 by Knights. This sword is also used by higher level Knights to fight creatures immune to Physical Damage, like Ghosts. Provides a small amount of red light. The graphic for the Fire Sword is an edit of the old Rapier sprite.

Can be obtained in the Orc Fortress Quest.
3 Fire Swords can be traded for a Magic Sulphur with Haroun or Yaman.

name: Giant Sword
notes:
Notes
Two-handed weapon and the heaviest weapon in the game, along with the Demonbone and Twiceslicer. It is a popular item, many medium level knights have one. It was more valuable before the mass introduction of new weapons in the Update 8.0. At the time, the next (and only) regular upgrade a sword-user could expect to attain was the rare Sword of Valor.
Can be traded for a Huge Chunk of Crude Iron with A Sweaty Cyclops ( Uth'Prta ).
Can be obtained through the Banshee Quest.

name: Gilded Eldritch Claymore
notes:
Notes
It works just like a standard Eldritch Claymore.

name: Glooth Blade
notes:
Notes
Breaks after 2 hits (this includes physical spells).Can be obtained by using a Glooth Bag.

name: Gnome Sword
notes:
Notes
The Sword is very popular among high level Knights due to its Energy Damage and Energy Resistance.

name: Golden Magic Longsword
notes:
Notes
This item was awarded for the winners of the Tournament Valour. The Gilded Magic Longsword looks the same and can be bought in the Store, which also means it cannot be traded with other players. 
Despite being a one-handed weapon, it has no attack nor defense, meaning it's only useful for decoration purposes.

name: Golden Warlord Sword
notes:
Notes
This was one of the prizes for the characters ranked first in Tournament Ascension. The Gilded Warlord Sword looks the same and can be bought in the Store, which also means it cannot be traded with other players.

name: Grand Sanguine Blade
notes:
Notes
It is part of the Sanguine Set. This item is not dropped by any creatures or bosses but it can be obtained from a Bag You Covet dropped by Bakragore when fighting him under the influence of Bakragore's Burden.

name: Grand Sanguine Razor
notes:
Notes
It is part of the Sanguine Set. This item is not dropped by any creatures or bosses but it can be obtained from a Bag You Covet dropped by Bakragore when fighting him under the influence of Bakragore's Burden.

name: Haunted Blade
notes:
Notes
It's not often used as a weapon. It can be used for decoration or sold. It's a very good item to loot because it has a high sell price and high gold-to-oz ratio (258gp/oz).

name: Havoc Blade
notes:
Notes
Was first looted in Lucera by Ticones, on New Year's Eve. Havoc Blade has gained much more in popularity after imbuement slots were implemented. Because of its three imbuement slots it is a viable option for anyone using a two-handed sword.

First Havoc Blade looted on Lucera

name: Heavy Machete
notes:
Notes
Like a Machete, but like the name says, heavier (and stronger). Can be used to cut down Wild Growths, Jungle Grass, and Venorean Spice.
This item can be used to cut 100 Jungle Grass in order to gain Nothing Can Stop Me achievement.
Secret Agent Tools can be used as a heavy machete.

name: Ice Rapier
notes:
Notes
Once it used to be the strongest sword weapon in the game (Atk:100), but also very fragile. It will break with the first hit (even when used while casting spells such as Exori or Whirlwind throw. It is usually being used as decoration rather than in actual fights. The attack value now consists of 42 physical and 18 ice damage.

name: Impaler of the Igniter
notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Incredible Mumpiz Slayer
notes:
Notes
Use the dead body of Monstor to have a chance of getting it. It is proof that you have slain him.
It looks like a Longsword with blue sparkles on it. 
There is a chance of obtaining it in the Isle of Evil Quest.

name: Inferniarch Blade
notes:
Notes
Part of the Inferniarch Set, can be used in the Doomforge to be turned into either a Siphoning Inferniarch Blade, Rending Inferniarch Blade, or Draining Inferniarch Blade.

name: Inferniarch Slayer
notes:
Notes
Part of the Inferniarch Set, can be used in the Doomforge to be turned into either a Siphoning Inferniarch Slayer, Rending Inferniarch Slayer, or Draining Inferniarch Slayer.

name: Jagged Sword
notes:
Notes
Obtainable in the cellar of the Knight Brotherhood villa on Island of Destiny, if you chose to join them. Knights can also get this sword in Dawnport. Due to a bug, the sword was also briefly brought to Rookgaard from Dawnport.

name: Katana
notes:
Notes
Katana is the strongest obtainable sword in Rookgaard.
It is part of the Rook Set.
It can be found as a daily spawn in Dusalk's Troll Clan Cave.
On Rookgaard you can obtain one through the Katana Quest.

name: Knife
notes:
Notes
The weakest sword in the game and is primarily used for training, either with another player or by slowly killing weak creatures with it. It's among the lightest melee weapons, making it valuable for destroying obstacles when trapped. It's considered very rare on Rookgaard, as it is only dropped by Apprentice Sheng.
Can be found as a daily spawn in a chest in Dusalk's Troll Clan Cave.

name: Light Rapier
notes:
Notes
This is now an Unobtainable Item.
It looks the same as a Rapier.

name: Lion Longsword
notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Longsword
notes:
Notes
Good weapon for lower levels, as well a good loot item when sold to the right shopkeeper.

name: Machete
notes:
Notes
Machetes can be used to cut down Wild Growths, Jungle Grass, and Venorean Spice.
This item can be used to cut 100 Jungle Grass in order to gain Nothing Can Stop Me achievement. Secret Agent Tools can be used as a machete.

name: Magic Longsword
notes:
Notes
Its inestimable value comes from its rarity and history. Also known as the Cyclopmania Sword, Cyc Sword and Godslayer. This sword is not available from any monster or quest in the game.
The in game legend says that, many years ago, the evil god Brog enslaved Cyclopes to smith weapons for his perilous armies. In secrecy, the smiths created this powerful weapon in order to commit mutiny against their captor. They failed at the task of slaying Brog, however he was heavily wounded. Filled with unspeakable rage he cast the sword down into the lands of Tibia to be lost forever. While buried in Brog's flesh, it became covered with his horrible blood, which hardened the blade and enchanted the Godslayer with unmatched power. However, a dark curse has been cast upon the blade causing its owner to become stricken with awesome madness and horrible luck. It is said nothing good can come to he who possesses the mystical blade. 

With AlexHonken's houseon Moises the Dark's house along with other rares

name: Magic Sword
notes:
Notes
It's also known as the Sword of Valor (or just SoV).
It is the best one-handed sword for level 80-99. Its a good choice for a high lvl mage that wants more def while hunting solo. Its value has dropped dramatically on servers where Emerald Sword is easy to obtain.
Obtained via the Annihilator Quest.

name: Mean Knight Sword
notes:
Notes
It looks like a Wooden Sword. You will receive this item from NPC Neill on the Festival of Initiates.

name: Mercenary Sword
notes:
Notes
It used to be a very rare drop from Man in the Cave and Serpent Spawn. It's more common now.

name: Mystic Blade
notes:
Notes
Commonly used One-Handed sword weapon. Probably a replacement for Giant Sword because it is one-handed, and only 2 Attack lower. It is the strongest sword that can be enchanted. This sword can be gotten in a quest, although it is in a Premium account area so the value is quite high.
Reward from the Barbarian Arena - Scrapper Mode.

name: Naga Sword
notes:
Notes
It's part of the Naga Set.

name: Nightmare Blade
notes:
Notes
It is an edited Assassin Dagger's sprite.

name: Pharaoh Sword
notes:
Notes
Bares some similarity to a Giant Sword, its graphic also having a similar shape and design. However, it is weaker than a Giant Sword but also one-handed. It would be a good weapon for players to use, if it was not one of the more elusive Pharaoh Rares, especially due to the fact Dipthrah is one of the harder Pharaohs. It can be seen on the counter near Ormuhn in Ankrahmun.

name: Poet's Fencing Quill
notes:
Notes
Use the dead body of Mephiles to have a chance of getting it. It is proof that you have slain him. This feather is actually weaker than a Sword. It cannot be used to break furniture as it has no use with option.
Looks the same as an Inkwell.
There is a chance of obtaining it in the Isle of Evil Quest.

name: Pointed Rabbitslayer
notes:
Notes
Use the dead body of Dirtbeard to have a chance of getting it. It is proof that you have slain him. It's the lightest Melee weapon in the game. It can not be used to break furniture or break through walls.
Looks the same as a Carrot and The Carrot of Doom.
There is a chance of obtaining it in the Isle of Evil Quest.

name: Poison Dagger
notes:
Notes
Since the Winter Update 2007, this dagger causes earth damage, which does 1 damage each turn and lasts approximately 1 turn for every 10 damage done to the creature. The harder the hit, the longer the creature is poisoned. 
Since the 2008 Summer Update this dagger shows a physical attack value of 16 plus an additional +2 in earth damage when you look at it. It still does the same poison damage as described above though. A few of those still remain in Rookgaard on a few worlds since they were once lootable from Minotaurs.

name: Rapier
notes:
Notes
The rapier is slightly stronger than a knife or dagger, but arguably less common because only Frost Trolls drop it.
It looks the same as a Light Rapier.
You can also get it in Rookgaard through the Rapier Quest.

name: Ratana
notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Relic Sword
notes:
Notes
Good weapon for level 50 players, but is somewhat hard to get.

name: Rending Inferniarch Blade
notes:
Notes
Part of the Inferniarch Set. Can be obtained using an Inferniarch Blade in the Doomforge.
None of the Rending Inferniarch weapons can be imbued with Basic, Intricate, or Powerful Strike.

name: Rending Inferniarch Slayer
notes:
Notes
Part of the Inferniarch Set. Can be obtained using an Inferniarch Slayer in the Doomforge.
None of the Rending Inferniarch weapons can be imbued with Basic, Intricate, or Powerful Strike.

name: Ron the Ripper's Sabre
notes:
Notes
Used to look the same as the Sabre until Updates/8.6 (Ron the Ripper's sabre sprite changed), but still share the same attributes apart from missing the Defense Modifier.

Used as a part of the Pirate Outfits Quest addon.

name: Runed Sword
notes:
Notes
This sword was implemented in the Winter Update 2008. In the past it had +3 Defense. Back then it was used often by Sorcerers and Druids due to its high defense modifier. Price can change extremely depending on each world.

name: Sabre
notes:
Notes
A mediocre weapon for beginners. Probably one of the first stronger weapons a new player will obtain on Rookgaard. Used to look the same as the Ron the Ripper's Sabre until 8.6, Ron the Ripper's Sabre sprite changed.

name: Sai
notes:
Notes
Obtainable since the Autumn Patch 2011.

name: Sanguine Blade
notes:
Notes
It is part of the Sanguine Set. This item is not dropped by any creatures or bosses but it can be obtained from a Bag You Covet, which can be looted from any boss in the 4 areas of the Rotten Blood Quest if some conditions are met. Can also be obtained through a Crimson Offering.

name: Sanguine Razor
notes:
Notes
It is part of the Sanguine Set. This item is not dropped by any creatures or bosses but it can be obtained from a Bag You Covet, which can be looted from any boss in the 4 areas of the Rotten Blood Quest if some conditions are met. Can also be obtained through a Crimson Offering.

name: Scimitar
notes:
Notes
Good sword for lower levels, now it's not often used because of the Jagged Sword. Can be valuable for selling to players because it's needed in a quest.

Reward in Barbarian Axe Quest.
Needed in Arito's Task Quest.

name: Serpent Sword
notes:
Notes
Good sword for low levels.
It has an attack of 18 Physical Damage plus 8 Earth Damage, thus it is a good weapon to hunt monsters weak to Earth Damage, like Cyclops.
Can be obtained as a reward in the Draconia Quest.

name: Shimmer Sword
notes:
Notes
It has the same attack value as Relic Sword but can be properly handled by players of level 40 while Relic Sword requires level 50. This item lasts for a total of 7 days.

Can be obtained by using a Shimmer Swimmer on a Flintstone. Upon creating one, you will receive the following message: Sharpening the surprisingly strong nose of the shimmer swimmer with a flintstone suddenly transforms him into a sword!

name: Shiny Blade
notes:
Notes
It is one of the best one-handed Sword Weapons, the best being Umbral Masterblade. It looks the same as The Epiphany , but in blue.

name: Short Sword
notes:
Notes
Sometimes used by lower levels in Rookgaard.
Obtainable in Amber's Lost Notebook Quest.

name: Silver Dagger
notes:
Notes
Daily respawn at the Mad Mage Room. Any purpose beyond decoration remains unknown.

name: Siphoning Inferniarch Blade
notes:
Notes
Part of the Inferniarch Set. Can be obtained using an Inferniarch Blade in the Doomforge.
None of the Siphoning Inferniarch weapons can be imbued with Basic, Intricate, or Powerful Void.

name: Siphoning Inferniarch Slayer
notes:
Notes
Part of the Inferniarch Set. Can be obtained using an Inferniarch Slayer in the Doomforge.
None of the Siphoning Inferniarch weapons can be imbued with Basic, Intricate, or Powerful Void.

name: Slayer of Destruction
notes:
Notes
Yana will trade you one for 50 Gold Tokens.

name: Soulcutter
notes:
Notes
Part of the Soul Set and one of the best Sword Weapons in the game.
It is a possible reward of the Soul War Quest, which guarantees one random item from the Soul Set the first time said quest is completed.
This item is not dropped by any creatures or bosses but it can be obtained from a Bag You Desire, which can be looted from any enemy or boss in the 5 areas of the Soul War Quest if some conditions are met.

name: Soulshredder
notes:
Notes
Part of the Soul Set and one of the best Sword Weapons in the game.
It is a possible reward of the Soul War Quest, which guarantees one random item from the Soul Set the first time said quest is completed.
This item is not dropped by any creatures or bosses but it can be obtained from a Bag You Desire, which can be looted from any enemy or boss in the 5 areas of the Soul War Quest if some conditions are met.

name: Spike Sword
notes:
Notes
Good for low levels. However, many prefer a Serpent Sword instead due the superority in weight, attack strength, and price. The Sword of Fury is a legendary Spike Sword on Rookgaard, but because no one has been able to obtain it, it may be only for show.
Can be obtainable through the Spike Sword Quest and Ornamented Shield Quest.

name: Summerblade
notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Sword
notes:
Notes
It can be used in Rookgaard, although people prefer Katanas than Swords. It is the third best sword in Rookgaard.
Used in the Desert Dungeon Quest.

name: Tagralt Blade
notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Templar Scytheblade
notes:
Notes
Shaped as a Scythe but used as a sword. This blade is created by the Lizards of Chor. The Lizard Templar wield them.
Serves as a decent weapon for levels 8-20, however the Spike Sword is easier to come by and superior in almost every way. Also, the Jagged Sword is free and only 2 attack lower.

name: Test Weapon for Knights
notes:
Notes
This is believed to be an Unobtainable Item.

name: Thaian Sword
notes:
Notes
It may be considered somewhat expensive and rare on some worlds due to being dropped by only a single, infrequently hunted boss.

name: The Avenger
notes:
Notes
It is one of the strongest sword weapons available in-game, with a very high defense value as a two-handed weapon. Its price varies greatly, but it is pretty cheap to get nowadays.
Obtainable through the Pits of Inferno Quest.

name: The Calamity
notes:
Notes
It's a rare item because it is only dropped by a boss monster.

2x The Calamity on the same House

name: The Epiphany
notes:
Notes
It replaced the Emerald Sword as the best one-handed sword and was later replaced by the Shiny Blade as the best one-handed Sword Weapon. Nowadays it's extremely valuable due to its rarity and only used as a decoration. 
It can currently be seen in Demodras's cave during the special task covered by 2 Gold Ingots along with some other rares.
Before Gamemasters were dismissed, CipSoft gave them a list of items to choose as a token of their appreciation and this is one of the items that were on this list.

The Epiphany seen on Pacera

name: The Justice Seeker
notes:
Notes
This great sword devalued the popular Magic Sword, with almost similar stats, and much easier to obtain. It is a great sword from Level 75-100.
Reward from the Arena, Warlord level.

name: Twiceslicer
notes:
Notes
This weapon is the heaviest in-game, along with the Giant Sword and Demonbone.

name: Twin Hooks
notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Two Handed Sword
notes:
Notes
Good Sword for medium levels. Can be obtained by using pile of bones in Giant Spider's cave which is located south of Plains Of Havoc temple. This sword also can be found every day in one of the chests in Plains of Havoc Cyclopes cave.

name: Umbral Blade
notes:
Notes
This weapon can only be imbued with Basic imbuements. Intricate and Powerful imbuements are not available for  Crude and Regular Umbral weapons.
See also Umbral Creation.

name: Umbral Master Slayer
notes:
Notes
Obtainable through Umbral Creation.

name: Umbral Masterblade
notes:
Notes
Currently the second best obtainable one-handed sword. It is the final stage of the one-handed Umbral swords. See also Umbral Creation.

name: Umbral Slayer
notes:
Notes
This weapon can only be imbued with Basic imbuements. Intricate and Powerful imbuements are not available for  Crude and Regular Umbral weapons.
See also Umbral Creation.

name: Warlord Sword
notes:
Notes
It used to be considered one of the best swords of Tibia, arguably second best after Magic Longsword. Over the years, however, stronger weapons with additional attributes such as skill boosts and elemental damage were implemented, topping it off from the list. Nevertheless, it's one of the rarest items in the game. Only a few players were able to obtain this powerful sword. It can be seen below A Sweaty Cyclops in Ab'Dendriel and in Morguthis Room. If you talk to the sweaty cyclops and say warlord sword, he will ask for materials to make it. These materials, however, remain unknown.

name: Winterblade
notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Wooden Sword
notes:
Notes
This used to be the first sword weapon a rookie sword-user would usually use, until it became a rare item. Looks the same as a Mean Knight Sword.
It's obtained in The Rookie Guard Quest.

name: Wyvern Fang
notes:
Notes
A good light one-handed weapon that is both easy to get and cheap.

name: Zaoan Sword
notes:
Notes
Part of the Zaoan Set.
